ns0:StringWithMarkup.ns0:String: LC50 Pimephales promelas (Fathead minnow, weight 114 mg) 7.01 mg/L/24 hr (95% confidence limit: 6.74-7.30 mg/L); flow-through bioassay, dissolved oxygen 7.4 (4.6-8.8) mg/L, water hardness 44.9 (42.4-46.6) mg/L as CaCO3, pH 6.9-7.7, alkalinity 42.9 (39.6-61.4) mg/L CaCO3, temp: 26.4 +/- 1.4 °C, Purity 99%+
